title: Otis Worldwide CEO on Re-Opening Buildings
itunes:title: Otis Worldwide CEO on Re-Opening Buildings
description:
Judy Marks, CEO at Otis Worldwide, discusses helping buildings around the world safely re-open.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Kailey Leinz. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
